prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with orange skin and blue wings that can soar through the skies.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a friendly dragon with a cheerful expression and a large, round belly.
Generate an image of a powerful dragon Pokemon that has stunning aqua-colored wings and a playful demeanor.
Make a design for a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a majestic dragon, featuring vibrant colors and a bold stance.
Imagine a dragon-like creature with a sweet personality, orange scales, and a knack for flying high above the clouds.
Show me a dragon Pokemon with a rounded body, playful nature, and striking blue wings that shimmer in the sunlight.
Design a large, friendly dragon Pokemon that loves to play with trainers and has a bright, colorful appearance.
